scripts.install: npm run install:server && npm run install:browser
scripts.prune: npm run prune:server && npm run prune:browser
scripts.format: npm run format:server && npm run format:browser
scripts.format:server: cd server && npm run format && cd ..
scripts.format:browser: cd browser && npm run format && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:browser
scripts.lint:server: cd server && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.lint:browser: cd browser && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.clean: npm run clean:server && npm run clean:browser
scripts.clean:server: cd server && npm run clean && cd ..
scripts.clean:browser: cd browser && npm run clean && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:browser
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:browser: cd browser && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.watch: npm run watch:server && npm run watch:browser
scripts.watch:server: cd server && npm run watch && cd ..
scripts.watch:browser: cd browser && npm run watch && cd ..
scripts.start:server: cd server && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.start-dev:server: cd server && npm run start-dev && cd ..
